Translations.Text: Mu by’ukuri, Allah ategeka (abantu) kurangwa n’ubutabera, kugira neza no gufasha abo bafitanye isano. Anabuza gukora ibikozasoni, ibibi no kurenganya. Ababurira kugira ngo mwibuke (amategeko ya Allah kandi abagirire akamaro)

Kandi mujye mwuzuza isezerano rya Allah igihe muritanze, ndetse ntimugatatire indahiro nyuma yo kuzishimangira kandi mwaragize Allah umwishingizi wanyu (ko muzazubahiriza). Mu by’ukuri, Allahazi ibyo mukora

Kandi ntimuzamere nka wawundi (umugore w’ubwenge buke) waboshye umutako we akawukomeza nyuma akawubohora, mugira indahiro zanyu uburyo bwo kuriganya hagati yanyu, kubera ko mufite imbaraga kandi mukaba benshi kurusha abo mwagiranye amasezerano. Mu by’ukuri, Allah abagerageresha ibyo (kugira ngo agaragaze uwumvira n’uwigomeka). Kandi rwose, ku munsi w’imperuka azabagaragariza ibyo mutavugagaho rumwe
N’iyo Allah aza kubishaka yari kubagira umuryango (umat) umwe, ariko arekera mu buyobe uwo ashaka akanayobora uwo ashaka. Kandi rwose muzabazwa ibyo mwajyaga mukora

Kandi ntimuzagire indahiro zanyu uburyo bwo kuriganya hagati yanyu, bityo ikirenge (cyanyu) kitazavaho kikanyerera (kiva muri Isilamu) nyuma y’uko cyari gishikamye (mu kwemera), maze mugasogongera ikibi (ibihano byo ku isi) kubera ko mwakumiriye (abantu) kuganainzira ya Allah, ndetse mukazahanishwa ibihano bihambaye
Ntimuzanagurane isezerano rya Allah igiciro gito. Mu by’ukuri, ibiri kwa Allah ni byo byiza kuri mwe iyaba mwarimubizi
Ibyo mutunze bizashira, ariko ibiri kwa Allahbizahoraho. Kandi rwose, babandi bihanganye tuzabagororera ibihembo byabo byiza kurusha ibyo bakoraga
Ukoze ibitunganye, yaba uw’igitsina gabo cyangwa uw’igitsina gore, kandi akaba ari umwemeramana,rwose tuzamuha ubuzima bwiza, ndetse tuzabagororera ibihembo byabobyiza kurusha ibyo bakoraga
Bityo, nuba ugiye gusoma Qur’an, ujye usaba Allah kukurinda Shitani wavumwe
Mu by’ukuri, (Shitani) nta bushobozi afite kuri babandi bemeye bakaniringira Nyagasani wabo (wenyine)
Mu by’ukuri, ubushobozi bwe (Shitani) abugira kuri babandi bamwumvira ndetse na babandi bamubangikanya (na Allah)
